meanings.sent1: The flag was unicolor, with no other colors mixed in.
meanings.sent2: She painted her room in a unicolor shade of blue.
meanings.sent3: The unicolor outfit made him look like a walking rainbow.
meanings.sent4: The unicolor sky stretched endlessly above us.
meanings.sent5: The unicolor flower stood out among the rest in the garden.

meanings.sent1: The unicolor dress she wore was elegant and simple.
meanings.sent2: The unicolor walls of the room created a calming atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: His unicolor socks always seemed to disappear in the laundry.
meanings.sent4: The unicolor painting captured the essence of solitude.
meanings.sent5: The unicolor sunset painted the sky in shades of orange and pink.
